alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Transylvania, northwestern Greenville and northeastern Pickens Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Brevard, or near Table Rock State Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pickens, Rosman, Table Rock State Park, Caesars Head State Park, Slater-Marietta, Jocassee Gorges, Pumpkintown, Connestee, Sassafras Mountain and Rocky Bottom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains
